history.text: Hi!  Can you tell me the title of the movie?
the title is "zootopia"
I feel like it is a play on "utopia" but with animals
clever! that makes sense.  Real animals or animated?
Animated :) It is a very cute movie!
i haven't seen it. :)
What's it about?
It is about an optimistic rabbit from a small town who travels to "zootopia" to become a police officer (apparently something only larger animals usually become) She soon becomes the first bunny cop!
Awww.  That does sound cute!  And some good messages too!

Then she meets a fox who is a con artist but she ends up becoming friends with him as he helps her solve a case. It also has valuable messages such as how wrong it is to discriminate against others. :D
Rotten Tomatoes rated it at 98%
that's cool.  I like when there are morals to the story.
I agree with their rating.
Me too!
Wow!  That's a high rating!
That scored higher than Frozen!
And animated movies these days are so realistic!
I loved Frozen ~ have you seen BravE?
Yes!! Loved it!
If you loved those two and Zootopia, I might have to give it a try.
Is Zootopia as good as Frozen and Brave?
Hmm, I would say Brave was my favorite but that is just me personally :) Zootopia is definitely worth watching if you like animated movies
I do. And I love the messages you mentioned - female empowerment, not prejudging
Appropriate for all ages?  i have children between the ages of 6 - 12
Thank you & thank you for speaking with me! I hope you have a lovely day!
You as well!  Enjoy your weekend!
Yes definitely

uid1response.feedback: That was a great conversation.  The other person gave a lot of information about the film that I found interesting, especially in regards to the themes and messages. I was also surprised by the Rotten Tomatoes score - it was really high.  I will definitely watch Zootopia with my children soon. :)
